/**
 * PetCareApp - Główny komponent aplikacji
 * Zawiera routing oraz lazy loading dla optymalizacji

 */import React,{Suspense,lazy}from'react';import{Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'./context/AuthContext';import LoadingSpinner from'./components/common/LoadingSpinner';import ProtectedRoute from'./components/common/ProtectedRoute';// Lazy loading komponentów dla optymalizacji wydajności - VS
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LandingPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/LandingPage'));const LoginPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/LoginPage'));const RegisterPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/RegisterPage'));const ForgotPasswordPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/ForgotPasswordPage'));// Dashboardy dla różnych ról - VS

const AdminUsers=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/admin/AdminUsers'));const AdminAppointments=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/admin/AdminAppointments'));const AdminServices=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/admin/AdminServices'));const AdminContent=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/admin/AdminContent'));const AdminReports=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/admin/AdminReports'));// Podstrony IT - VS
const ITSystemStatus=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/it/ITSystemStatus'));const ITLogs=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/it/ITLogs'));const ITMonitoring=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/it/ITMonitoring'));const ITSecurity=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/it/ITSecurity'));const ITInfrastructure=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/it/ITInfrastructure'));// Strony błędów - VS
const NotFoundPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./pages/NotFoundPage'));/**
 * Główny komponent aplikacji - zarządza routingiem i autoryzacją
 * @returns {JSX.Element} Główny komponent App
 */function App(){const{user,isLoading}=useAuth();// Funkcja przekierowująca do odpowiedniego dashboardu - VS
const getDashboardPath=role=>{const dashboardPaths={'client':'/dashboard/client','vet':'/dashboard/vet','admin':'/dashboard/admin','it':'/dashboard/it'};return dashboardPaths[role]||'/';};if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingSpinner,{fullScreen:true});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Suspense,{fallback:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingSpinner,{fullScreen:true}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LandingPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:getDashboardPath(user.role)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/register",element:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:getDashboardPath(user.role)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegisterPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/forgot-password",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ForgotPasswordPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/client",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['client'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClientDashboard,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/client/pets",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['client'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClientPets,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/client/appointments",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['client'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClientAppointments,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/client/notifications",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['client'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClientNotifications,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/client/payments",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['client'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClientPayments,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/client/contact",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['client'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClientContact,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/vet",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['vet'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VetDashboard,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/vet/patients",element:/*#__PUR */_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['it'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ITDashboard,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/it/status",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['it'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ITSystemStatus,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/it/logs",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['it'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ITLogs,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/it/monitoring",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['it'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ITMonitoring,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/it/security",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['it'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ITSecurity,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard/it/infrastructure",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{allowedRoles:['it'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ITInfrastructure,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NotFoundPage,{})})]})});}export
